001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import au.com.bytecode.opencsv.CSVReader;
004
005import java.io.IOException;
006import java.io.Reader;
007import java.util.HashMap;
008import java.util.Map;
009
010public class D2LGradesCSVParser {
011
012  private static final String[] ignoredColumnNames = new String[] {
013    "Calculated Final Grade Numerator",
014    "Calculated Final Grade Denominator",
015    "Adjusted Final Grade Numerator",
016    "Adjusted Final Grade Denominator",
017    "End-of-Line Indicator"
018  };
019  private final GradesFromD2L grades;
020  private int usernameColumn = -1;
021  private int lastNameColumn = -1;
022  private int firstNameColumn = -1;
023  private int emailColumn;
024  private Map<Integer, String> quizColumnsAndNames = new HashMap<>();
025
026  public D2LGradesCSVParser(Reader reader) throws IOException {
027    CSVReader csv = new CSVReader( reader );
028    String[] firstLine = csv.readNext();
029    extractColumnNamesFromFirstLineOfCsv(firstLine);
030
031    grades = new GradesFromD2L();
032
033    String[] studentLine;
034    while ((studentLine = csv.readNext()) != null) {
035      addStudentAndGradesFromLineOfCsv(studentLine);
036    }
037  }
038
039  private void addStudentAndGradesFromLineOfCsv(String[] line) {
040    GradesFromD2L.D2LStudentBuilder builder = GradesFromD2L.newStudent();
041    builder.setFirstName(getFirstNameFromLine(line));
042    builder.setLastName(getLastNameFromLine(line));
043    builder.setD2LId(getUsernameFromLine(line));
044
045    GradesFromD2L.D2LStudent student = builder.create();
046
047    if (student.getD2lId().startsWith("guest")) {
048      return;
049    }
050
051    this.grades.addStudent(student);
052
053    addGradesFromLineOfCsv(student, line);
054  }
055
056  private void addGradesFromLineOfCsv(GradesFromD2L.D2LStudent student, String[] line) {
057    this.quizColumnsAndNames.forEach((index, quizName) -> {
058      String score = line[index];
059      if (!isEmptyString(score)) {
060        student.setScore(quizName, parseScore(score));
061      }
062    });
063
064  }
065
066  private boolean isEmptyString(String score) {
067    return "".equals(score);
068  }
069
070  private double parseScore(String score) {
071    return Double.parseDouble(score);
072  }
073
074  private String getUsernameFromLine(String[] line) {
075    String username = line[getUsernameColumn()];
076    if (username.charAt(0) == '#') {
077      username = username.substring(1);
078    }
079    return username;
080  }
081
082  private String getLastNameFromLine(String[] line) {
083    return line[getLastNameColumn()];
084  }
085
086  private String getFirstNameFromLine(String[] line) {
087    return line[getFirstNameColumn()];
088  }
089
090  private void extractColumnNamesFromFirstLineOfCsv(String[] firstLine) {
091    for (int i = 0; i < firstLine.length; i++) {
092      String cell = firstLine[i];
093      switch (cell) {
094        case "Username":
095          usernameColumn = i;
096          break;
097        case "Last Name":
098          lastNameColumn = i;
099          break;
100        case "First Name":
101          firstNameColumn = i;
102          break;
103        case "Email":
104          emailColumn = i;
105          break;
106        default:
107          if (!isColumnIgnored(cell)) {
108            addQuiz(extractQuizName(cell), i);
109          }
110      }
111    }
112
113  }
114
115  private void addQuiz(String quizName, int column) {
116    quizColumnsAndNames.put(column, quizName);
117  }
118
119  private String extractQuizName(String cell) {
120    // Programming Background Quiz Points Grade <Numeric MaxPoints:4>
121    int index = cell.indexOf(" Points Grade");
122    if (index > -1) {
123      return cell.substring(0, index);
124
125    } else {
126      return cell;
127    }
128  }
129
130  public boolean isColumnIgnored(String columnName) {
131    return contains(ignoredColumnNames, columnName);
132  }
133
134  private boolean contains(String[] ignoredColumnNames, String columnName) {
135    for (String ignored : ignoredColumnNames) {
136      if (ignored.equals(columnName)) {
137        return true;
138      }
139    }
140
141    return false;
142  }
143
144  public int getUsernameColumn() {
145    return usernameColumn;
146  }
147
148  public int getLastNameColumn() {
149    return lastNameColumn;
150  }
151
152  public int getFirstNameColumn() {
153    return firstNameColumn;
154  }
155
156  public int getEmailColumn() {
157    return emailColumn;
158  }
159
160  public Iterable<String> getQuizNames() {
161    return quizColumnsAndNames.values();
162  }
163
164  public GradesFromD2L getGrades() {
165    return grades;
166  }
167}
